name: Wild Pilot
overview: Wild Pilot is a rail shooter. The player is bounty hunter - he flies in a biplane and hunts for criminals. The player controls only the cannon - the plane is headed by another character, and flies along a specified route. Along the way the player eliminates dozens of enemy planes. The main part of the fun is to fight bosses - they have a long life bar, and the player must shoot until it reaches 0.
